rows.label: xs33200110_MSG0010
rows.name: This is...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33200110_MSG0020
rows.name: Hmm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33200110_MSG0025
rows.name: Elma? You figured something out?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33200110_MSG0030
rows.name:
It looks like some kind of massive database
on the ancient Samaarians.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33200110_MSG0035
rows.name: The Samaarians?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33200110_MSG0036
rows.name: Ohoho! Nose of Tatsu smell whiff of momentous discovery![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33200110_MSG0040
rows.name: Bear with me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33200110_MSG0050
rows.name: We might be able to glean something useful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33200110_MSG0060
rows.name: It's pretty fragmented...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33200110_MSG0070
rows.name: All right, let me tell you what I found out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33200110_MSG0080
rows.name: At first, this whole place was inside of the Rift.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33200110_MSG0085
rows.name: It seems it was designed to contain Void.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33200110_MSG0090
rows.name: And this structure, where we're standing now—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33200110_MSG0100
rows.name: it was a sealing construct, made by Samaar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33200110_MSG0110
rows.name:
That is, a device to restrain Void's power.
The sheer scale of it is staggering...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33200110_MSG0115
rows.name:
I knew it! I told you this tower had to have
something to do with Void.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33200110_MSG0120
rows.name: It looks dormant right now...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33200110_MSG0130
rows.name: but it's not completely dead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33200110_MSG0135
rows.name: Well in that case—![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33200110_MSG0140
rows.name:
Right. If we can activate it, with any luck,
we might be able to weaken him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33200110_MSG0150
rows.name: I'm not sure what would actually happen,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33200110_MSG0155
rows.name: but seems worth a try.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33200110_MSG0160
rows.name: I'll turn it on. Be ready for anything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33200110_MSG0170
rows.name:
Gwuuh-uuh!
Wh-why all the shaking?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33200110_MSG0180
rows.name: Uh... Elma?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33200110_MSG0190
rows.name: Better back off, and quick![ST:wait ]
